label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_025
content:

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-01: CPU 96% | Mem 90% | Disk Used 99% | Disk Busy 99% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 11.4 Gbps / Out 10.0 Gbps
- stor-b-21: CPU 78% | Mem 81% | Disk Used 98% | Disk Busy 96% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 8.5 Gbps / Out 7.8 Gbps
- stor-c-24: CPU 70% | Mem 76% | Disk Used 96% | Disk Busy 91% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 7.1 Gbps / Out 6.4 Gbps
- meta-03: CPU 82% | Mem 95% | Disk Used 90% | Disk Busy 82% | Conns: N/A | Net: In 4.8 Gbps / Out 4.0 Gbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-1: active 120 | idle 30 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 2 | max 150 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-2: active 85 | idle 20 | waiting 3 | exhaustion 1 | max 100 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-3: active 60 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 80 | avg_wait 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 87.1% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 134,000

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] utilization crossed 90%; enacted emergency policy on cluster
- [WARNING] quota hard blocks rose to 7 with +244 TB ingest
- [INFO] compaction pending climbed to 138; scrub errors at 47
- [NOTICE] snapshot verification had one failure due to verifier backlog

### Deployments & Changes
- Enacted emergency quota policy: no quota increases without approved deletion plan, tightened burst allowances
- Coordinated tenant backfill pause and cold data shift to EC pool
- Scheduled two-stage compaction surge: overnight and midday
- Increased monitoring cadence for compaction and scrub errors
- Doubled verifier workers for snapshot verification; re-verified within the hour

### Events
- Utilization crossed 90%; enacted emergency policy: no quota increases without approved deletion plan and tightened burst allowances
- Quota hard blocks rose to 7 with +244 TB ingest; coordinated with tenant owners to pause non-critical backfills and shift cold data to EC pool
- Compaction pending climbed to 138 and scrub errors to 47; scheduled two-stage compaction surge (overnight + midday) and increased monitoring cadence
- Snapshot verification had one failure due to verifier backlog; temporarily doubled verifier workers and re-verified within the hour

### On-Call
- Shift: Jordan S. 13 pages. 23 tickets. Status: Degraded; cluster operating in emergency capacity mode (>90%). Focus is on strict quota governance, aggressive compaction scheduling, and controlling tenant ingest/backfill behavior
